title: Builders of Egypt: Prologue
notes: Mouse-only controls. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: Builders Of Egypt: Prologue is a city-building economic strategy taking place in the Nile Valley. Immerse yourself in a world full of pyramids, where you will become a part of the ancient world. Create history, be history!
